oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate staff nofficer's sword carried by Col. William S. Barry of the 35th Miss. Inf.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beautifully etched blade with regimental designation, polished wooden grip with twisted brass wire. Owned by Col. Barry, who chaired the Mississippi secession committee and raised the 35th Miss. Inf. Regt. Fine etching on blade probably executed by Jacob Faser of Macon, Miss. "CS" is filigreed into the guard.
